Package org.radarbase.management.web.rest.errors

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    EntityName  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ErrorConstants  
    ErrorVM
    View Model for transferring error message with a list of field errors.
    ExceptionTranslator
    Controller advice to translate the server side exceptions to client-friendly json structures.
    FieldErrorVM  
    RadarWebApplicationExceptionVM
    View Model for sending a RadarWebApplicationException.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    BadRequestException
    The request could not be understood by the server due to malformed syntax.
    ConflictException
    Created by dverbeec on 13/09/2017.
    InvalidRequestException
    The server understood the request, but is refusing to fulfill it.
    InvalidStateException
    The server encountered an unexpected condition which prevented it from fulfilling the request.
    NotFoundException
    Created by dverbeec on 7/09/2017.
    RadarWebApplicationException
    A base parameterized exception, which can be translated on the client side.
    RequestGoneException
    Throw when the requested resource is no longer available at the server and no forwarding address is known.
